title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, when the key is left blank but a valid value is assigned, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Leave the key blank in the properties file when adding a localization key. 2. Check that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
